item.description: 오늘 한 것 SWEA 문제풀이 연산 from collections import deque def sol(start, end): check = {} check[start] = end while q: num, cnt = q.popleft() if num == end: return cnt if num > 1000000 or num <= 0: continue for i in range(4): a = 0 if i == 0: a = num + 1 if a not in check: q.append((a, cnt+1)) check[a] = 1 elif i == 1: a = num - 1 if a not in check: q.

오늘 한 것 SWEA 문제풀이 연산 from collections import deque def sol(start, end): check = {} check[start] = end while q: num, cnt = q.popleft() if num == end: return cnt if num > 1000000 or num <= 0: continue for i in range(4): a = 0 if i == 0: a = num + 1 if a not in check: q.append((a, cnt+1)) check[a] = 1 elif i == 1: a = num - 1 if a not in check: q.
